entry.title: love, at the worst
entry.summary:
Author: greyspilot

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,407Chapters: 2/12Kudos: 34

Summary: When Eddie came back to L.A. from Texas, Buck knew he would have to move out of Eddie's house, eventually. That had always been the plan; it was always going to be temporary, but Eddie didn't ask, so Buck didn't offer. One night, after a particularly long shift when they were both half-dead on their feet, they collapsed onto the bed together. All they did that night was sleep, but it continued every night after. They didn't talk about it, and Buck thinks that should've been his first warning sign.Or: the Wishbone fic

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn‚Äôt end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they‚Äôre reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: Through Frosted Glass
entry.summary:
Author: TheRealBagelGod

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,400Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 57

Summary: He had a brother. Daniel Evan Buckley. Evan. They gave Buck his name. There were no pictures of Daniel past the year 1989. Two years before Buck was born. Daniel died when he was six years old. And Buck was born to replace him. That‚Äôs what he believed for the next fifteen years. It made too much sense. Why his mom couldn‚Äôt bear to look at him most of the time. Why both of his parents put so much pressure on him to do well. He was their second chance. Daniel number two. The son they had instead of the one they wanted. But he was wrong. And the narrative he had written for himself was about to come crashing down.

entry.title: He's Not Human
entry.summary:
Author: bandhoez9194

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,893Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 55

Summary: He looked to where it was pulling, seeing the brightest blue eyes staring at him. /He's not human/ his magic whispered to him, Eddie tensing as he eyed him right back. "Oh, that's Buck, don't know what's up with him. He's usually pretty happy, a golden retriever. I'm sure you two will be friends in no time," Hen said reassuringly, Eddie nodding slowly without looking away. He'd never felt this aura before, a creature he didn't know. His magic wasn't on the defensive though, if anything, it was wanting to break free of his skin and drag him over. He'd never felt his magic feel so playful before.

entry.title: Brown eyes
entry.summary:
Author: Nazz1987

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,654Chapters: 10/20Kudos: 38

Summary: Diego gave him a big sweet smile and for a second Buck lost control and his gaze landed upon the other man lips. Quickly realizing he was being challenged at a staring competition and went back to where his eyes were first. The guitar player break the game with a smile like a white flag on the horizon and took a swing of his drink. "I'm gonna warn you if you look at me like that again i might try to kiss you" and a cheeky smile tugged at Diego's mouth. Buck mirrored his face and leaned a bit closer "If you're asking for consent you already have it" and winked at him. They stayed still for a few seconds, their faces were really close. Diego's eyes became darker and without losing more time he closed their distance with a soft and sweet kiss. --- Or, Buck meets a new guy and starts dating. entry.title: A Rare Gemstone
entry.summary:
Author: bandhoez9194

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,034Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: A bright reddish orange shimmer caught his eye, his feet taking him to the wall. There was a gem in the dirt, about the size of a quarter, shimmering with the most amazing shades of red, orange, yellow and every color in between. It reminded him of a red hot coal slowly cooling off in rock form. He nudged it a bit and it fell out of the dirt, nestling in his palm. This was it, the stone he wanted for an engagement ring. ~~~~~ Eddie wants to propose to Buck, but is having trouble finding a ring. When he and Buck go exploring some caves, they stumble upon a cavern full of gems

entry.title: home is just a room full of my safest sounds
entry.summary:
Author: alisonlynn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,398Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 259

Summary: "I'd kind of forgotten dual fertility was a thing? You'd think that time we delivered that lost hiker‚Äôs baby in the woods would've made more of an impression. I still can't believe he didn‚Äôt know he was pregnant? That was a huge baby.‚Äù ‚ÄúHuh,‚Äù Eddie says, but it sounds a little strangled. Is Eddie grossed out by people with dual fertility? Some people are, but he hadn't seemed uncomfortable when he'd been up close and personal with that guy's junk when the baby refused to wait for Chim and Hen. It had been an awfully cute baby, is all Buck is saying. Totally worth how his hand got a little crushed. Or, the one where Buck and Eddie are both pregnant, the babies are both Tommy's, and they're both in love with each other. And they have each other's back, no matter what.

entry.title: There's Something In The Water
entry.summary:
Author: bandhoez9194

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,574Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 17

Summary: /Where'd the water go?/ Buck fought the current, bouncing off debris and his lungs screaming at him. Christopher had been ripped from his arms, and no matter where he looked, he couldn't see him. /Christopher!/ He could see a shimmer, the sun above him. He tried to kick off the ground, his arms fighting to get him above the water, but something held him back. He looked down but couldn't see anything, the water murky and brown. But something held onto his leg, his shin burning with pain as whatever it was dug in. His lungs burned, the need to breathe in getting stronger and stronger. But he couldn't, he had to save Christopher. /Why didn't you save me?/ The words were nearly visible, bright red in the dirty brown swirling around him. Bleeding against the darkness, bright and vivid in his vision. /I'm trying Chris, I promise, I'm trying. I just need to get free!/

entry.title: A Strange Hat
entry.summary:
Author: bandhoez9194

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,026Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 50

Summary: Buck sighed as Chris grinned at him, victory in his eyes. "I won! I did it!" He cheered and Buck smiled amused at him, unable to be upset that he'd lost. "Alright Superman, you won the bet. What's your request?" He asked and Chris grinned, thinking hard. "I want you to wear a hat I have for a whole day, even at work unless you have to put your helmet on," he said and Buck's mouth fell open. ~~~~~~~ Buck loses a bet, has to wear a silly hat and somehow leads to confessing how he feels to Eddie
